ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from entering values in the Vendor address fields, when the EDI or the EFT value is chosen for the Payment Method field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( (ISPICKVAL(Payment_Method__c, 'EDI')) || (ISPICKVAL(Payment_Method__c, 'EFT')) ), ( NOT(ISBLANK(Vendor_City__c)) || NOT(ISPICKVAL(Vendor_State_Province__c, '')) || NOT(ISBLANK(Vendor_Street_Address1__c)) || NOT(ISBLANK(Vendor_Zip_Postal_Code__c)) ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must not enter values into the Vendor address fields when the EDI or EFT the value is chosen for the Payment Method field.
